problem.markdown:
In this comparison, which computer part is analogous to short term memory?
[[Motherboard, CPU/Processor, (RAM), Video Card, Power Supply, Hard Disk, Optical Drive]]
[explanation] The Random Access Memory is similar to short term memory because it contains most of the current information on the computer. This includes data necessary for future CPU computations. [explanation]
